title: 90s R&B Throwback Mix
content: Just a little something to take you back to when life was easier....

title: Today's Top Hits
content: The most popular songs right now! I love listening to the top hits and jamming out to great music

title: Something Chill
content: Just a relaxing playlist for when you want to take the vibes down a bit. I usually listen to this playlist when I'm getting ready for bed, or when I'm coding late into the night.

title: Electronic Eleganza
content: Beep beep boop ba boop I am a robot and I like electronic music because that is what my thoughts sOUND like o_O

title: Disco Forever
content: Disco will never die!!! They tried to burn it down, but it rose again like a phoenix and Disco burns brighter today than it ever did before!

title: Country Mix
content: For when you're riding a horse or workin the fields! That's what I love about music, it really can manifest in so many different genres and each iteration has its own appeal.

title: I friggin love Drake!!!
content: The best of the best! These are my favorite Drake songs, but it was hard not to include them all on this list :D

title: my best songs
